languages.text: {n}Вы напрягаете все мышцы в теле, но бессильны сдвинуть его хотя бы на сантиметр — темная воля давит на ваши плечи, не позволяя даже распрямиться.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы напрягаете все мышцы в теле, но бессильны сдвинуть его хотя бы на сантиметр — темная воля давит на ваши плечи, не позволяя даже распрямиться.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You strain every muscle in your body but cannot move an inch — the dark will presses down upon your shoulders, forbidding you even from straightening your back.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы напрягаете все мышцы в теле, но бессильны сдвинуть его хотя бы на сантиметр — темная воля давит на ваши плечи, не позволяя даже распрямиться.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You strain every muscle in your body, but can't move an inch — the dark will presses down upon your shoulders, forbidding you even from straightening your back.{/n}
{n}You strain every muscle in your body, but can't move an inch — the dark will presses down upon your shoulders, forbidding you even from straightening your back.{/n}
{n}You strain every muscle in your body, but can't move an inch — the dark will presses down upon your shoulders, forbidding you even from straightening your back.{/n}
{n}You strain every muscle in your body but cannot move an inch — the dark will presses down upon your shoulders, forbidding you even from straightening your back.{/n}
{n}You strain every muscle in your body but cannot move an inch — the dark will presses down upon your shoulders, forbidding you even from straightening your back.{/n}
{n}You strain every muscle in your body but cannot move an inch — the dark will presses down upon your shoulders, forbidding you even from straightening your back.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aunque tensas todos los músculos del cuerpo, no logras moverte ni un ápice. La oscura voluntad oprime tus hombros, impidiendo siquiera que endereces la espalda.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You strain every muscle in your body but cannot move an inch — the dark will presses down upon your shoulders, forbidding you even from straightening your back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aunque tensas todos los músculos del cuerpo, no logras moverte ni un ápice. La oscura voluntad oprime tus hombros, impidiendo siquiera que endereces la espalda.{/n}

languages.text: {n}身体中のあらゆる筋肉に力を入れるが、まったく動けない。闇が肩の上に重くのしかかり、背中を真っすぐ伸ばすことすらできない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You strain every muscle in your body but cannot move an inch — the dark will presses down upon your shoulders, forbidding you even from straightening your back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}身体中のあらゆる筋肉に力を入れるが、まったく動けない。闇が肩の上に重くのしかかり、背中を真っすぐ伸ばすことすらできない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}即便你绷紧了身上的每块肌肉，也丝毫无法动弹。黑暗猛压在你的双肩上，沉重得令你无法挺直脊背。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You strain every muscle in your body but cannot move an inch — the dark will presses down upon your shoulders, forbidding you even from straightening your back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}即便你绷紧了身上的每块肌肉，也丝毫无法动弹。黑暗猛压在你的双肩上，沉重得令你无法挺直脊背。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Malgré tous vos efforts, vous ne parvenez pas à bouger le moindre muscle de votre corps. La sombre volonté exerce une telle pression sur vos épaules qu'il vous est impossible de vous redresser.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You strain every muscle in your body but cannot move an inch — the dark will presses down upon your shoulders, forbidding you even from straightening your back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Malgré tous vos efforts, vous ne parvenez pas à bouger le moindre muscle de votre corps. La sombre volonté exerce une telle pression sur vos épaules qu'il vous est impossible de vous redresser.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du strengst jeden Muskel in deinem Körper an, kannst dich jedoch keinen Zentimeter bewegen — die Dunkelheit drückt deine Schultern nach unten und verhindert, dass du überhaupt nur deinen Rücken aufrichtest.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You strain every muscle in your body but cannot move an inch — the dark will presses down upon your shoulders, forbidding you even from straightening your back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du strengst jeden Muskel in deinem Körper an, kannst dich jedoch keinen Zentimeter bewegen — die Dunkelheit drückt deine Schultern nach unten und verhindert, dass du überhaupt nur deinen Rücken aufrichtest.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bedenindeki tüm kasları kullansan da hareket edemiyorsun. Omuzlarına çöken karanlık irade, belini doğrultmana dahi müsaade etmiyor.{/n}
